name: EXscape
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 38!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/exscape

Sometimes it's a small world and that's a good thing.
You run into your dearest friends completely unexpectedly.
Other times you're at the same nightclub as your ex and you're not quite emotionally ready to see them.
It might be best to hold off on this conversation until you're in a better place.

CONTROLS

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Dance

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Complete the objective at the top of the screen
  • Avoid your exes!
  • Dancing with a lot of people around you will make them take longer to detect you when inside their vision cone
  • However, you stand out if you are dancing alone!
